data.price: Kuma waɗanda suke cẽwa "Yã Ubangijinmu! Ka bã mu sanyin idãnu daga mãtanmu da zũriyarmu, kuma Ka sanya* mu shũgabanni ga mãsu taƙawa."
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
data.footnotes: * Anã son mutum ya rõƙi Allah Ya ɗaukaka shi, shi da zuriyarsa, ɗaukakar addini, kamar yadda Annabi Ibrãhĩm ya yi rõƙon haka. Kuma wannan yanã cikin sifõfin Bãyin Mai rahama.

dua.name: Dua for Family Protection
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine blessings for family, requesting righteous and compassionate descendants.
